p: However, according to this virulence, the almost null rate of severe illness in children and generally in patients younger than 40Â years old is quite un-explicable. Among patients of these age groups the virus behaviour is similar to that of seasonal community-acquired coronaviruses which are responsible also of severe but very rarely lethal infections such us pneumonia and bronchiolitis. In fact, even if this virus grows rapidly and continuously change, it is counteracted rapidly and effectively by an efficient immune response that the host has time to implement.
